item.title: Instacart’s weak outlook for the end of the year drags the stock lower
item.description: Instacart says sales are up 12%, but investors worry about weaker outlook and the prospect of cooling demand.

item.title: ​Trump’s win sparked stocks for this surprising reason — and it’s fueling the market rally
item.description: Investors hate uncertainty; the U.S. election result was quick and orderly.

item.title: ‘I’ve no interest in investing more money in the stock market’: I’m debt-free, retired and ignoring the ‘Trump bump.’ What should I do with $400,000?
item.description: “I already have $1.5 million in the stock market.”
